title: Dr. Facilier

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Summon an ability from your friends on the other side.
- For 2 Malice, read another player's past. You will learn 3 roles, one of them being their real role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may passively interact with your friends on the other side (dead chat)
- You may only use each ability once before that friend needs to rest.

fields.name: Malice Overflow:
fields.value:
- All dead players, at this very moment, instantly switch alignment to win with you.
- You may now use any ability an infinite amount of times.
- Reading the past is now replaced with reading the future, which changes their role based on the host's discretion. You may provide some input, however.
